kickstart.post:
sed -e '/ChallengeResponseAuthentication/s/no/yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config > /tmp/sshd_config
/bin/grep -q 'google-otp' /etc/pam.d/sshd if [ $? -ne 0 ] && [ -f /etc/pam.d/sshd ]; then sed -e '/#%PAM-1.0/s@#%PAM-1.0@#%PAM-1.0\nauth include google-otp@' /etc/pam.d/sshd > /tmp/pamd_sshd
/bin/rm /tmp/pamd_sshd fi
